attributes.action: Exempt all work and state pensions from having to have income tax deducted. They should be tax free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have paid income tax all my working life on all my earnings. Why should my employment pensions be taxed, when I've paid income tax already, on all my previously earned income.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
